title: Pulumi Patterns and Practices Platform (P3): A reference architecture for large-scale organizations
description: Pulumi Patterns and Practices Platform (P3) is a reference architecture of a Pulumi-based internal platform for infrastructure management and secure deployments in a large-scale environment.
cntitle: Pulumi 模式与实践平台 (P3)：面向大型组织的参考架构
cndescription: Pulumi 模式与实践平台 (P3) 是一个基于 Pulumi 的内部平台的参考架构，用于在大型环境中进行基础设施管理和安全部署。
